DECLARE @sj TABLE (id nvarchar(64), [relations] nvarchar(1000), [key] int, [manager] nvarchar(64), rn int, rnd int)

INSERT INTO @sj
SELECT
	gu.[id]
	, gu.[relations]
	, item.[key]
	, CONCAT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', LEFT(mgu.[email], CHARINDEX('@', mgu.[email]) - 1)), 2),
		CASE
			WHEN RIGHT(mgu.[email], LEN(mgu.[email]) - CHARINDEX('@', mgu.[email])) = 'avenga.com' THEN '@avenga.com.dev'
			ELSE RIGHT(mgu.[email], LEN(mgu.[email]) - CHARINDEX('@', mgu.[email]) + 1)
		END) AS [manager]
	, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY gu.id ORDER BY item.[key]) AS rn
	, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY gu.id ORDER BY item.[key] desc) AS rnd
FROM [gsuite].[GoogleUsers]  gu
	OUTER APPLY OPENJSON( gu.[relations] ) AS item
	OUTER APPLY OPENJSON( item.[value] ) WITH ( [type] nvarchar(64) '$.type', [value] nvarchar(64) '$.value') r 
	LEFT JOIN [gsuite].[GoogleUsers] mgu ON mgu.[email] = r.[value]
WHERE r.[type] = 'manager'
;WITH sm AS(
  SELECT [id], [rn], [rnd], JSON_MODIFY([relations], CONCAT('$[', CAST([key] AS INT), '].value'), [manager]) as [relations]   
  FROM @sj WHERE RN = 1
  UNION ALL
  SELECT x.[id], x.[rn], x.[rnd], JSON_MODIFY(sm.[relations], CONCAT('$[', CAST(x.[key] AS INT), '].value'), x.[manager]) 
  FROM @sj as x INNER JOIN sm ON x.[id] = sm.[id]  AND x.[rn] = (sm.[rn] + 1)
)
SELECT 
	 [id] = u.[id]
	,[email] =
		CONCAT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', LEFT(u.[email], CHARINDEX('@', u.[email]) - 1)), 2),
			CASE
				WHEN RIGHT(u.[email], LEN(u.[email]) - CHARINDEX('@', u.[email])) = 'avenga.com' THEN '@avenga.com.dev'
				ELSE RIGHT(u.[email], LEN(u.[email]) - CHARINDEX('@', u.[email]) + 1)
			END)
	,[givenName] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', u.[givenName]), 2)
	,[familyName] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', u.[familyName]), 2)
	,[fullName] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', u.[fullName]), 2)
	,[suspended] = u.[suspended]
	,[relations] = ISNULL(sm.[relations], u.[relations])
	,[addresses] = u.[addresses]
	,[organizations] = u.[organizations]
	,[Tier] = u.[Tier]
	,[Competency] = u.[Competency]
FROM [gsuite].[GoogleUsers] u
LEFT JOIN sm ON u.id = sm.id AND sm.rnd = 1

IF EXISTS(SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM [dbo].[Parameter] WHERE [ParameterName] = 'DWHLastRefresh')
	UPDATE [dbo].[Parameter]
	SET [ParameterValue] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR, GETDATE(), 20)
	WHERE [ParameterName] = 'DWHLastRefresh'
ELSE 
	INSERT INTO [dbo].[Parameter] ([ParameterName], [ParameterValue])
	SELECT
		[ParameterName] = 'DWHLastRefresh'
		,[ParameterValue] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR, GETDATE(), 20);

SELECT [ParameterValue]
FROM [dbo].[Parameter]
WHERE [ParameterName] = 'DWHLastRefresh';

source.sqlReaderQuery:
with cte_EmpPositions as 
(
	SELECT ep.[Id] -- Id Employee
	,ep.[EmployeeId]
	,ep.[StartDate]
	,dtt.[name] as [PositionName]
	,ep.[TechnologyId]
	,ep.[EmploymentType]
	,ep.[Billable]
	,ep.[FullTimeEquivalent]
	,ep.[CreatedOn]
	,ep.[CreatedBy]
	,ep.[ModifiedOn]
	,ep.[ModifiedBy]
	,ep.[DeletedOn]
	,ept.DepartmentId as IdDepartment
	,ROW_NUMBER() over (partition by ep.EmployeeId order by ep.StartDate desc) as row_id
	FROM [UA_CoreBase_staging_dbo].[EmployeePosition] ep
		--left join [UA_CoreBase_staging_dbo].[Position] p on p.id = ep.PositionId
		LEFT OUTER JOIN [UA_CoreBase_staging_dbo].[EmployeePositionTiers] AS ept ON ep.[Id] = ept.[EmployeePositionId]
		LEFT OUTER JOIN [UA_CoreBase_staging_dbo].[DepartmentTierTitles] AS dtt ON ept.[DepartmentTierTitleId] = dtt.[Id]
	where ep.[DeletedOn] is null
),
cte_EmploymentHistory AS 
(
	SELECT 
		EmployeeID,
		EndDate,
		ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION by EmployeeID ORDER BY StartDate DESC) AS RowNum
	FROM [UA_CoreBase_staging_dbo].[EmployeeEmployment]
)
SELECT
	 Email = e.[Email],
	 FirstName = e.[FirstName], 
	 LastName = e.[LastName], 
	 FullName = e.[FullName], 
	 TechnologyName = tli.Name,
	 TierName = dt.[Value],
	 SeniorityName = case when dt.Value = 1 then 'Trainee' when dt.Value in (2,3) then 'Junior' when dt.Value in (4,5) then 'Middle' when dt.Value in (6,7) then 'Senior' else NULL end,
	 CompetencyName = tli.Name,
	 CountryName = 'Ukraine',
	 BranchName = b.BrancheName,
	 DepartmentName = d.DepartmentName,
	 Gender = CASE WHEN e.[Gender] = 1 THEN 'Male' ELSE 'Female' END,
	 IsCertified = CASE  WHEN EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM [UA_CoreBase_staging_dbo].[EmployeeCertifications] c WHERE c.[EmployeeId] = e.Id)  THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No'  END,
	 StartDate = e.[StartDate],
	 EndDate = eh.[EndDate],
	 IsActive = e.[IsActive],
	 ExternalId = e.[Id],
	 EmploymentType = cast(CASE WHEN ep.[EmploymentType] = 0 THEN 'Employee' WHEN ep.[EmploymentType] = 1 THEN 'Contractor' WHEN ep.[EmploymentType] = 2 THEN 'Consultant' WHEN ep.[EmploymentType] = 3 THEN 'SupportStaff' END AS NVARCHAR(100)),
	 HrPartnerId = e.[HrPartnerId],
	 ManagerId = e.IdSuperior,
	 Billable = ep.Billable,
	 FullTimeEquivalent = ep.[FullTimeEquivalent],
	 PositionName = SUBSTRING(ep.[PositionName], 1, 250),
	 UserLogin = e.[UserLogin],
	 Address = e.[Address],
	 PhoneNumber = e.[PhoneNumber],
	 Birthday = e.[Birthday],
	 EmployeePositionRow_id = ep.row_id,
	 EmployeePositionCreatedOn = ep.CreatedOn
FROM [UA_CoreBase_staging_dbo].[Employee] e
	inner join cte_EmpPositions ep on e.[Id] = ep.[EmployeeId] --and ep.[row_id] = 1 /*move historical data to synapse*/
	left join [UA_CoreBase_staging_dbo].[EmployeePositionTiers] ept on ept.[EmployeePositionId] = ep.[id]
	left join [UA_CoreBase_staging_dbo].[DepartmentTiers] dt on dt.[id] = ept.[DepartmentTierId]
	left join [UA_CoreBase_staging_dbo].[DepartmentTierTitles] dtt on dtt.[id] = dt.[TitleId]
	left join [UA_CoreBase_staging_dbo].[DepartmentTierTitles] dtt1 on dtt1.[id] = ept.[DepartmentTierTitleId]
	left join [UA_CoreBase_staging_dbo].[Technology] tli on tli.id = ep.[TechnologyId]
	--left join [UA_CoreBase_staging_dbo].[ListItem] tli on tli.id = ISNULL(ep.[TechnologyId], e.[TechnologyId]) -- this is depricated and get from the Tehnology table which above
	left join [UA_CoreBase_staging_dbo].Department d on d.Id = ISNULL(ISNULL( ept.[DepartmentId], dt.[DepartmentId]),ep.IdDepartment)
	left join [UA_CoreBase_staging_dbo].Branche b on b.Id = e.[IdBranch]
	left join cte_EmploymentHistory eh on eh.[EmployeeID] = e.[ID] and eh.[RowNum] = 1
WHERE  e.[Id] <> 0 and ep.[DeletedOn] is NULL -- and e.IsActive = 1

	,[FederationIdentifier] = 
		CASE WHEN COALESCE([FederationIdentifier], '') = ''
				THEN [FederationIdentifier]
			 WHEN CHARINDEX('@', [FederationIdentifier]) = 0
			 	THEN CONCAT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', LOWER([FederationIdentifier])), 2), '@avenga.com.dev')
			 ELSE CONCAT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', LEFT(LOWER([FederationIdentifier]), CHARINDEX('@', [FederationIdentifier]) - 1)), 2),
			 		CASE WHEN RIGHT([FederationIdentifier], LEN([FederationIdentifier]) - CHARINDEX('@', [FederationIdentifier])) = 'avenga.com' 
			 				THEN '@avenga.com.dev'
			 			 ELSE RIGHT([FederationIdentifier], LEN([FederationIdentifier]) - CHARINDEX('@', [FederationIdentifier]) + 1)
			 		END) 
		END	,[AboutMe]

	,fpf.[ProjectID]
	,[ProjectManager] = LTRIM(value)
FROM [dbo].[FactProjectForecast] fpf
	INNER JOIN [dbo].[Project] p ON fpf.[ProjectKey] = p.[ProjectKey] AND p.[IsCurrent] = 1
    CROSS APPLY STRING_SPLIT(p.[ProjectManager], ';')
WHERE RTRIM(value) <> ''

	UPDATE [dbo].[Parameter]

	WHERE [ParameterName] = 'BacklogLastRefresh'
ELSE 
	INSERT INTO [dbo].[Parameter] ([ParameterName], [ParameterValue])
	SELECT
		[ParameterName] = 'BacklogLastRefresh'
		,[ParameterValue] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR, GETDATE(), 20);

SELECT [id]
      ,[displayName] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', [displayName]), 2)
      ,[firstName] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', [firstName]), 2)
      ,[lastName] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', [lastName]), 2)
      ,[jobTitle]
      ,[workPhone]
      ,[mobilePhone]
      ,[workEmail] =
		CASE WHEN COALESCE([workEmail], '') = ''
				THEN [workEmail]
			 WHEN CHARINDEX('@', [workEmail]) = 0
			 	THEN CONCAT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', LOWER([workEmail])), 2), '@avenga.com.dev')
			 ELSE CONCAT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', LEFT(LOWER([workEmail]), CHARINDEX('@', [workEmail]) - 1)), 2),
			 		CASE WHEN RIGHT([workEmail], LEN([workEmail]) - CHARINDEX('@', [workEmail])) = 'avenga.com' 
			 				THEN '@avenga.com.dev'
			 			 ELSE RIGHT([workEmail], LEN([workEmail]) - CHARINDEX('@', [workEmail]) + 1)
			 		END) 
		END
      ,[location]
      ,[division]
      ,[supervisor] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', [supervisor]), 2)
      ,[department]
  FROM [PL_BambooHR_AITP].[Employees]

			WHEN CHARINDEX('@', [workEmail]) = 0
				THEN CONCAT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', LOWER([workEmail])), 2), '@avenga.com.dev')
			ELSE CONCAT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', LEFT(LOWER([workEmail]), CHARINDEX('@', [workEmail]) - 1)), 2),
					CASE WHEN RIGHT([workEmail], LEN([workEmail]) - CHARINDEX('@', [workEmail])) = 'avenga.com' 
							THEN '@avenga.com.dev'

DECLARE @agroup TABLE ([ProjectID] nvarchar(100), [rID] integer)

INSERT INTO @agroup ([ProjectID], [rID])
SELECT
	[ProjectID] = LEFT(g.rName, CHARINDEX('_', g.rName)-1)
	,[rID]
FROM projectile.agroup g
WHERE SUBSTRING(g.rName, CHARINDEX('_', g.rName)+1, LEN(g.rName)) = 'ProjectManagers'

DECLARE @axref TABLE (sysDocument nvarchar(100), sysValue nvarchar(100))

INSERT INTO @axref (sysDocument, sysValue)
SELECT
	sysDocument = RIGHT(r.sysDocument ,CHARINDEX('|',REVERSE(r.sysDocument))-1)
	,sysValue = RIGHT(r.sysValue ,CHARINDEX('|',REVERSE(r.sysValue))-1)
FROM projectile.axref r
WHERE r.sysCollection = 'Users'

SELECT
	g.[ProjectID]
	,[ProjectManager] = STRING_AGG(CONCAT(e.pName, ' ', e.pFirstName), '; ')
FROM @agroup g
INNER JOIN @axref r ON r.sysDocument = g.rId
INNER JOIN projectile.auser u ON u.rId = r.sysValue
INNER JOIN (SELECT pEmployee, pName, pFirstName FROM projectile.temployee) e ON e.pEmployee = u.rName
GROUP BY g.[ProjectID]

DECLARE @CurrentDate DATE = GETDATE();
SELECT 
	[Today] = @CurrentDate
	,[MonthName] = DATENAME(month,@CurrentDate)
	,[PreviousMonthName] = DATENAME(month, DATEADD(month, -1, @CurrentDate))
	,[DayNumber] = DATEPART(day, @CurrentDate)
	,[WorkingDayNumber] = MAX([BusinessDayNo])
FROM [pbi].[vCalendar]
WHERE [Date] <= @CurrentDate
	AND [LastDayOfMonth] = EOMONTH(@CurrentDate)

WITH CTE_ProjectForecast AS
(
SELECT
	[Const] = 1
	,[ArrayValue] = CAST(
	CONCAT(
		'["', ISNULL([Customer as reported (grouped)], '')
		,'", "', ISNULL([Customer (as reported)], '')
		,'", "', REPLACE([ProjectName], '"', '\"')
		,'", "', [ProjectID]
		,'", "', ISNULL([ProjectManager], '')
		,'", "', DATEADD(day, -1, fpf.[Date])
		--,'", "', [Currency]
		,'", ', ISNULL([Actuals MD rate (calc.)], 0)
		,', ', ISNULL([ManDaysRemaining], 0)
		,', ', ISNULL([ManDaysSpent], 0)
		--,'", "', [Code]
		,', "=H2-SUM(R2:AH2)"' -- Divergence
		,', ', ISNULL([January], 0)
		,', ', ISNULL([February], 0)
		,', ', ISNULL([March], 0)
		,', ', ISNULL([April], 0)
		,', ', ISNULL([May], 0)
		,', ', ISNULL([June], 0)
		,', ', ISNULL([July], 0)
		,', ', ISNULL([August], 0)
		,', ', ISNULL([September], 0)
		,', ', ISNULL([October], 0)
		,', ', ISNULL([November], 0)
		,', ', ISNULL([December], 0)
		,', ', ISNULL([Next FY January], 0)
		,', ', ISNULL([Next FY February], 0)
		,', ', ISNULL([Next FY March], 0)
		,', ', ISNULL([Next FY April], 0)
		,', ', ISNULL([Next FY May], 0)
		,', ', ISNULL([Next FY June], 0)
		,', ', ISNULL([Next FY July], 0)
		,', ', ISNULL([Next FY August], 0)
		,', ', ISNULL([Next FY September], 0)
		,', ', ISNULL([Next FY October], 0)
		,', ', ISNULL([Next FY November], 0)
		,', ', ISNULL([Next FY December], 0)
		--,'", "', [ManDaysPlanningTotal]
		, ']'
	) AS NVARCHAR(MAX))
FROM [pbi].[vFactProjectForecastMI] fpf
	INNER JOIN [dbo].[Calendar] c ON fpf.[Date] = c.[Date]
WHERE c.[LastDayOfMonth] = EOMONTH(GETDATE())
)
SELECT [ArrayList] = STRING_AGG([ArrayValue], ',')
FROM CTE_ProjectForecast
GROUP BY [Const]

source.sqlReaderQuery:
WITH ScrambledCTE AS
(
	SELECT
		[Id]
		,[Adjusted_Rate__c] = CASE WHEN ISNULL([Adjusted_Rate__c], 0) <> 0 THEN (ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID())) % 61) + 40 ELSE 0 END
		,[Default_Org_Adjusted_Amount__c] = CASE WHEN ISNULL([Default_Org_Adjusted_Amount__c], 0) <> 0 THEN (ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID())) % 61) + 40 ELSE 0 END
		,[Default_Org_Cost_Amount__c] = CASE WHEN ISNULL([Default_Org_Cost_Amount__c], 0) <> 0 THEN (ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID())) % 61) + 40 ELSE 0 END
		,[Default_Org_Rate_Amount__c] = CASE WHEN ISNULL([Default_Org_Rate_Amount__c], 0) <> 0 THEN (ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID())) % 61) + 40 ELSE 0 END
		,[Hourly_Cost__c] = CASE WHEN ISNULL([Hourly_Cost__c], 0) <> 0 THEN (ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID())) % 61) + 40 ELSE 0 END
		,[Hourly_Rate__c] = CASE WHEN ISNULL([Hourly_Rate__c], 0) <> 0 THEN (ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID())) % 61) + 40 ELSE 0 END
		,[Duration_Hours] =
			CASE
				WHEN [Duration_Unit__c] = 'Days' THEN CAST([Duration__c] AS DECIMAL(9,2)) * 8
				WHEN [Duration_Unit__c] = 'Months' THEN CAST([Duration__c] AS DECIMAL(9,2)) * 168
				ELSE CAST([Duration__c] AS DECIMAL(9,2))
			END
	FROM [GLO_Salesforce].[Project_Team_Member__c]
)
SELECT
	p.[Id]
    ,[IsDeleted]
    ,[Name]
    ,[CurrencyIsoCode]
    ,[CreatedDate]
    ,[CreatedById]
    ,[LastModifiedDate]
    ,[LastModifiedById]
    ,[SystemModstamp]
    ,[LastActivityDate]
    ,[Opportunity__c]
    ,s.[Adjusted_Rate__c]
    ,[Comment__c]
    ,[Contribution__c]
    ,s.[Default_Org_Adjusted_Amount__c]
    ,s.[Default_Org_Cost_Amount__c]
    ,s.[Default_Org_Rate_Amount__c]
    ,[Duration_Unit__c]
    ,[Duration__c]
    ,s.[Hourly_Cost__c]
    ,s.[Hourly_Rate__c]
    ,[Is_Invalid_Duration__c]
    ,[Location__c]
    ,[Opportunity_Stage__c]
    ,[Project_Start__c]
    ,[Quantity__c]
    ,[Senioryty__c]
    ,[Technology__c]
    ,[Tier__c]
    ,[Total_Adjusted_Rate__c] = s.[Adjusted_Rate__c] * s.[Duration_Hours]
    ,[Total_Cost__c] = s.[Hourly_Cost__c] * s.[Duration_Hours]
    ,[Total_Rate__c] = s.[Hourly_Rate__c] * s.[Duration_Hours]
FROM [GLO_Salesforce].[Project_Team_Member__c] p
	INNER JOIN ScrambledCTE s ON p.Id = s.Id

SELECT
	[OdataType]
	,[OdataID]
	,[MemberID]
	,[BusinessPhones]
	,[DisplayName] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', [DisplayName]), 2)
	,[GivenName] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', [GivenName]), 2)
	,[JobTitle]
	,[Mail] = NULLIF(CONCAT(
		CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', LEFT([Mail], CHARINDEX('@', [Mail]) - 1)), 2),
		CASE
			WHEN RIGHT([Mail], LEN([Mail]) - CHARINDEX('@', [Mail])) = 'avenga.com' THEN '@avenga.com.dev'
			ELSE RIGHT([Mail], LEN([Mail]) - CHARINDEX('@', [Mail]) + 1)
		END), '')
	,[MobilePhone]
	,[OfficeLocation]
	,[PreferredLanguage]
	,[Surname] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', [Surname]), 2)
	,[UserPrincipalName] = NULLIF(CONCAT(
		CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', LEFT([UserPrincipalName], CHARINDEX('@', [UserPrincipalName]) - 1)), 2),
		CASE
			WHEN RIGHT([UserPrincipalName], LEN([UserPrincipalName]) - CHARINDEX('@', [UserPrincipalName])) = 'avenga.com' THEN '@avenga.com.dev'
			ELSE RIGHT([UserPrincipalName], LEN([UserPrincipalName]) - CHARINDEX('@', [UserPrincipalName]) + 1)
		END), '')
	,[GroupID]
FROM [GLO_AzureAD].[AzureGroupMembers]

			CONCAT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', LEFT([Email], CHARINDEX('@', [Email]) - 1)), 2),
				CASE
					WHEN RIGHT([Email], LEN([Email]) - CHARINDEX('@', [Email])) = 'avenga.com' THEN '@avenga.com.dev'
					ELSE RIGHT([Email], LEN([Email]) - CHARINDEX('@', [Email]) + 1)
				END)
      ,[UserId]
      ,[SyncToken]
FROM [gsuite].[GoogleCalendarEvents]

sqlReaderQuery.value: UPDATE [gsuite].[GoogleCalendarSyncTokens] SET SyncToken = NULL OUTPUT inserted.* WHERE UserId = @{item().id};

source.sqlReaderQuery:
;WITH select_user_token AS (
	SELECT DISTINCT UserId, Email, SyncToken
	FROM [gsuite].[GoogleCalendarEvents]
	WHERE SyncToken IS NOT NULL
)
MERGE [gsuite].[GoogleCalendarSyncTokens] AS tgt  
USING select_user_token AS src
ON (tgt.UserId = src.UserId)  
WHEN MATCHED THEN
    UPDATE SET SyncToken = src.SyncToken,
			   Email= src.Email
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN  
    INSERT (UserId, Email, SyncToken)  
    VALUES (src.UserId, src.Email, src.SyncToken)
	OUTPUT inserted.*, $action;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS #EmployeeRecordTypeTemp;

CREATE TABLE #EmployeeRecordTypeTemp (
	SequentialId INT,
	OriginalTypeId INT,
	TypeName NVARCHAR(50)
);

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS #EmployeeRecordStatusTemp;

CREATE TABLE #EmployeeRecordStatusTemp (
	SequentialId INT,
	OriginalStatusId INT,
	StatusName NVARCHAR(50)
);

INSERT INTO #EmployeeRecordTypeTemp (SequentialId, OriginalTypeId, TypeName)
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY Id) AS SequentialId
	  ,Id
	  ,[Name]
FROM [UA_CoreBase_staging_dbo].[EmployeeRecordType];

INSERT INTO #EmployeeRecordStatusTemp (SequentialId, OriginalStatusId, StatusName)
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY Id) AS SequentialId
	  ,Id
	  ,[Name]
FROM [UA_CoreBase_staging_dbo].[EmployeeRecordStatus];

DECLARE @MaxSequentialTypeId INT, @MaxSequentialStatusId INT;

SELECT @MaxSequentialTypeId = MAX(SequentialId) 
FROM #EmployeeRecordTypeTemp;

SELECT @MaxSequentialStatusId = MAX(SequentialId) 
FROM #EmployeeRecordStatusTemp;

;WITH cte_employee_record_random AS (
	SELECT er.[Id]
		  ,er.[EmployeeId]
		  ,er.[AuthorId]
		  ,er.[SuperiorId]
		  ,er.[Date]
		  ,er.[TypeId]
		  ,er.[StatusId]
		  ,er.[Comment]
		  ,ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID())) % @MaxSequentialTypeId + 1 AS SequentialTypeId
		  ,ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID())) % @MaxSequentialStatusId + 1 AS SequentialStatusId
		  ,ert.[TypeName]
  FROM [UA_CoreBase_staging_dbo].[EmployeeRecord] AS er
  INNER JOIN #EmployeeRecordTypeTemp AS ert ON ert.OriginalTypeId = er.TypeId
)
SELECT err.[Id]
	  ,err.[EmployeeId]
	  ,err.[AuthorId]
	  ,err.[SuperiorId]
	  ,CASE WHEN err.[TypeName] IN ('Onboarding', 'End of probation', 'Exit interview')
				THEN err.[TypeId]
			ELSE ert.[OriginalTypeId]
	   END AS TypeId
	  ,ers.[OriginalStatusId] AS StatusId
	  ,err.[Date]
	  ,err.[Comment]
FROM cte_employee_record_random AS err
LEFT JOIN #EmployeeRecordTypeTemp AS ert ON ert.SequentialId = err.SequentialTypeId
LEFT JOIN #EmployeeRecordStatusTemp AS ers ON ers.SequentialId = err.SequentialStatusId;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS #EmployeeRecordTypeTemp;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS #EmployeeRecordStatusTemp;

;WITH cte_get_randomized_names AS (
	SELECT [Id]
		  ,[Name]
		  ,[Birthdate]
		  ,[EmployeeId]
		  ,ROW_NUMBER () OVER(ORDER BY [Id]) AS original_seq_id
		  ,ROW_NUMBER () OVER(ORDER BY NEWID()) AS random_id
	FROM [UA_CoreBase_staging_dbo].[EmployeeKids]
)
SELECT grn1.[Id]
	  ,grn2.[Name]
	  ,grn1.[Birthdate]
	  ,grn1.[EmployeeId]
FROM cte_get_randomized_names AS grn1
INNER JOIN cte_get_randomized_names AS grn2 ON grn1.original_seq_id = grn2.random_id;

FROM [UA_CoreBase_staging_dbo].[Passport]

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
      [id]
      ,[employmentHistoryStatus]
      ,[workEmail] =
		CASE WHEN COALESCE([workEmail], '') = ''
				THEN [workEmail]
			WHEN CHARINDEX('@', [workEmail]) = 0
				THEN CONCAT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', LOWER([workEmail])), 2), '@avenga.com.dev')
			ELSE CONCAT(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(32), HashBytes('MD5', LEFT(LOWER([workEmail]), CHARINDEX('@', [workEmail]) - 1)), 2),
					CASE WHEN RIGHT([workEmail], LEN([workEmail]) - CHARINDEX('@', [workEmail])) = 'avenga.com' 
							THEN '@avenga.com.dev'
						ELSE RIGHT([workEmail], LEN([workEmail]) - CHARINDEX('@', [workEmail]) + 1)
					END) 
		END
  FROM [DE_BambooHR_ADACH].[EmployeeEmploymentStatuses]
